ntu.scse.cz2002.restaurant.control

Class TableController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ntu.scse.cz2002.restaurant.control.TableController

  • public class TableController
extends java.lang.Object
    Control Class to control Table occupancy and reservation
    communicates with Order&Reservation Controllers to control the flow of orders
    Since:
    2019-04-17
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    keane

        Free a specified table after customers are done eating.
        Parameters:
        tableId - ID of the specified table.
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if unsuccessful.
